about_the_game:
Invention 7 - the game begins 3 years after the end of the previous part. Casey and Dorian live happily away from the endless crowds of zombies, mutants and combat robots. However, the idyll is interrupted by Casey's abduction. Artificial Intelligence - Frederick was able to recover and find them. The player will have to go through a difficult path and return to Invention Corp to find out the reason for Casey's abduction.
The game combines a first-person shooter with easy puzzles, as well as a scrolling shooter mode, where the player will have to fly a space plane.
- Dynamic First-person Shooter with fiery Heavy Metal!
- Control the cyborg Dorian, who can ram enemies with a running start and shoot ball lightning!
- Various locations: Village, Snow Valley, Laboratory.
- Several very strong bosses, for which you need to choose tactics, otherwise they will crush you!
- Scroll shooter mode with different enemies and different types of weapons.
- Interesting puzzles, however, which can be skipped if they seem too difficult for you.
